title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.1 - Compliance with federal boxing laws
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.1 - Compliance with federal boxing laws

State Regulations
(a) Boxers must be at least eighteen (18) years of age and possess a current

Federal ID Card in order to compete in a professional boxing match or
exhibition. (b) There shall be full
compliance with the Professional Boxing Safety Act of 1996 and the Muhammad Ali

Boxing Reform Act (15 USC ยง
6301, et seq.) and any amendments made
thereto. Notes

ยง
211.1

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
